title: bRadio Free Music
description:
Listen for free to the most Latin Music available on your Android with the newly relaunched bRadio App.
bRadio
now offers you access to more music, new opportunities to personalize your listening experience! Using the largest library of Latin Music available, you can create personal radio stations that play only your favorite music and artists. Choose your genre, artists, songs or even your mood and let bRadio create a radio station that is as unique as you are. Then choose what you like or don’t like in order to further personalize your station as you listen.
Hundreds of thousands of songs are also available on over 200 exclusive genre radio stations and over 10,000 artist radio stations. You can also browse the music library to discover the music you'll love.
Whether you enjoy or create stations on the Android
bRadio
is fully integrated and can be accessed on any device. Download the entirely new
bRadio
app today to begin enjoying and discovering the best Latin music wherever you are!
Do you want to know more about bRadio?
✪ Like us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/batanga
✪ Follow us on Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/bradiomusic
✪ Do you like
bRadio
? Please, rate us 5 Star ★★★★★
description_html:
Listen for free to the most Latin Music available on your Android with the newly relaunched bRadio App.

bRadio now offers you access to more music, new opportunities to personalize your listening experience! Using the largest library of Latin Music available, you can create personal radio stations that play only your favorite music and artists. Choose your genre, artists, songs or even your mood and let bRadio create a radio station that is as unique as you are. Then choose what you like or don’t like in order to further personalize your station as you listen.

Hundreds of thousands of songs are also available on over 200 exclusive genre radio stations and over 10,000 artist radio stations. You can also browse the music library to discover the music you'll love.

Whether you enjoy or create stations on the Android bRadio is fully integrated and can be accessed on any device. Download the entirely new bRadio app today to begin enjoying and discovering the best Latin music wherever you are!
